name: css storytelling iframe
format:
<style>
ui-card-panel.ng-scope.visible {
    position: relative;
    left: 0px !important;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}
.nr-dashboard-cardcontainer {
    width: inherit !important;
    height: inherit !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-template.ng-scope.visible {
    overflow: hidden;
    /* Calculated from the aspect ration of the content (in case of 16:9 it is 9/16= 0.5625) */
    padding-top: 58.25%;
    position: relative;
    opacity: 1;
    width: inherit !important;
    height: inherit !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-template.ng-scope.visible iframe {
    border: 0;
    height: 100%;
    left: 0;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
}
.ng-scope md-content.flex {
    overflow: -moz-hidden-unscrollable; 
}
</style>

name: responsive stories
format:
<style>
@media (max-width: 959px) {

}
@media (max-width: 959px) and (min-width: 0) and (orientation: portrait) {
  md-toolbar {
    max-height: unset; /* 48px; */
  }
  .nr-dashboard-template.ng-scope.visible {
      padding-top: 200%;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 960px) {
  
}
@media (max-width: 660px) {
  
}
@media (min-width: 661px) {
  
}

</style>

name: css alerts iframe
format:
<style>
ui-card-panel.ng-scope.visible {
    position: relative;
    left: 0px !important;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}
.nr-dashboard-cardcontainer {
    width: inherit !important;
    height: inherit !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-template.ng-scope.visible {
    overflow: hidden;
    /* Calculated from the aspect ration of the content (in case of 16:9 it is 9/16= 0.5625) */
    padding-top: 58.25%;
    position: relative;
    opacity: 1;
    width: inherit !important;
    height: inherit !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-template.ng-scope.visible iframe {
    border: 0;
    height: 100%;
    left: 0;
    position: absolute;

name: responsive alerts
format:
<style>
@media (max-width: 959px) {

}

@media (max-width: 959px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .nr-dashboard-template.ng-scope.visible {
     padding-top: 160% !important;
  }
}
@media (max-width: 600px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .nr-dashboard-template.ng-scope.visible {
      padding-top: 165% !important;
  }
}
@media (max-width: 400px) and (orientation: portrait) {
  .nr-dashboard-template.ng-scope.visible {
     padding-top: 200% !important;
  }
}
@media (max-width: 959px) and (orientation: landscape) {
  .nr-dashboard-template.ng-scope.visible {
      padding-top: 100% !important;
  }
}


@media (min-width: 960px) {
  
}
@media (max-width: 660px) and (orientation: landscape) {
  .nr-dashboard-template.ng-scope.visible {
      padding-top: 50.25% !important;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 661px) {
  
}

</style>
